rmi.rmi

Class SiteImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • rmi.rmi.SiteImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, SiteItf

    public class SiteImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SiteItf
    Implementation of the data transfer mecanism between nodes Each nodes will be implemented in differents virtual machines
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(int id,
        java.util.ArrayList<SiteItf> sons,
        SiteItf father)
        Initialize the RMI object with it's ID, it's sons (if the node is not a leaf) and it's father (if the node is not the root)
        Parameters:
        id - An integer to represent the node
        sons - Sons of the node (null if the node is a leaf)
        father - Father of the node (null if the node is a root)

      • sendDataToSon

        public void sendDataToSon(byte[] data)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: SiteItf
        Method to send data (a byte array) to sons of node. When the node receive the data, he will send it to each son. Also, he will prevent us the good reception of data.
        Specified by:
        sendDataToSon in interface SiteItf
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send - a byte array
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
